text: Nagra ama mopafi kini vahera kini tratetira zamazeri netre'na, megi'a kini vahe'mo'zama kegavama nehaza hankavezmia eri haviza nehu'na, karisiramine agumpima mani'za vanoma nehaza vahe'enena zamazeri atregahue. Hosi agumpima mani'za vanoma nehaza vahe'mo'za bainati kazinteti zamagra'a ohefri ahefri hugahaze.
